rows.label: qev050903_MSG0001
rows.name: Ah, you return. You have the parts, I trust?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050903_MSG0002
rows.name:
Excellent. With these, we can begin repairs on a Skell
that has been sitting abandoned for weeks.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050903_MSG0003
rows.name: I will order the repair work started immediately.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050903_MSG0004
rows.name: ...Repairs on the Skell are complete.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050903_MSG0005
rows.name: Your efforts have brought a Skell back from the grave.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050903_MSG0006
rows.name: Um, sir? May I ask why you called me here?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050903_MSG0007
rows.name:
Those parts were gathered for your sake.
I would think some thanks would be in order.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050903_MSG0008
rows.name: Y-yes, of course.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050903_MSG0009
rows.name:
You have done much for me, human.
I offer you my heartfelt gratitude.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050903_MSG0010
rows.name: Thank you for everything.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050903_MSG0011
rows.name: I think that proves the bond of trust you share.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050903_MSG0012
rows.name:
Now then, we were discussing a possible reassignment,
were we not?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050903_MSG0013
rows.name: About that, sir...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050903_MSG0014
rows.name:
I think you may have had the right of it. I may have
been considering this move as a way to escape my
own failings on the battlefield.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050903_MSG0015
rows.name:
I was afraid of working with my fellow soldiers to
achieve our goals. Resorting to reassignment is
tantamount to running away. Thereforeâ€”[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050903_MSG0016
rows.name: Get to the damn point, Gu Ladha![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050903_MSG0017
rows.name: Y-yes, sir! What I mean is...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050903_MSG0018
rows.name: Actually, belay that! I have no time for your excuses.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050903_MSG0019
rows.name: Y-you are as stern as ever, sir...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050903_MSG0020
rows.name:
Gu Ladha, you are hereby issued the Skell that was just
repaired.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050903_MSG0021
rows.name: ...Issued, sir?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050903_MSG0022
rows.name:
Even serving as a liaison is dangerous work.
The mission clearly merits the use of a Skell.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050903_MSG0023
rows.name: What? But... Wait, then...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050903_MSG0024
rows.name:
You built a bond with this person, and [ST:gender p1=he p2=she ] worked
to assist you. That is an accomplishment, a product of
your labor, and a show of your particular talents.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050903_MSG0025
rows.name:
Such was the whole purpose of my request to this
BLADE in the first place.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050903_MSG0026
rows.name:
To gauge the extent to which the people you call
comrades actually value their relationship with you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050903_MSG0027
rows.name:
The results speak for themselves, and I have decided
that liaison is the ideal position for a Wrothian with
your skill set.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050903_MSG0028
rows.name: Sir...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050903_MSG0029
rows.name:
That is all, Gu Ladha. ...Oh, and I expect great things.
Remember to give proper thanks and respect to those
you call friends.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050903_MSG0030
rows.name: Y-yes, sir! Thank you, sir![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050903_MSG0031
rows.name: I will work to the very best of my abilities![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050903_MSG0032
rows.name:
I hope we can continue to be good friends for a long
time to come, [ST:playername ]![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050903_MSG0033
rows.name:
I require an advanced core, two bloodied faces,
and three tempered blade modules. ...More an errand
of convenience than a test, but I trust you do not mind.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050903_MSG0034
rows.name:
I expect you did not come here expecting to be put to
work, and for this, you have my apologies.
Still, I hope you will do this for Gu Ladha.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050903_MSG0035
rows.name:
Perhaps she has been waiting to meet friends like you
all this while.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050903_MSG0036
rows.name: Someone to give her that push forward.[ST:wait ]
